events.message: The customer reported a severe car accident involving collision with another vehicle on a busy intersection during rush hour.
The claim has been officially categorised under Auto Accident following the initial review of the accident report and photographs.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to handle this particular case for the customer.
Acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the claimant confirming reception and next steps for processing the auto accident case.
The customer has been requested to submit the police report, vehicle registration, and photographs of the damaged car for evaluation.
All required documents including the police report and accident photos were submitted promptly by the customer for assessment.
Investigation into the vehicle collision and liability has been commenced based on the submitted documented evidence.
The investigation was completed successfully with clear determination of fault and damage extent supported by witness statements.
A settlement offer has been proposed outlining the compensation amount for vehicle repair and rental car expenses.
The customer acknowledged the proposed settlement positively and appreciated the quick processing of their auto accident claim.
The insurance claim has been approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the claimant's designated bank account.
The claim file has been officially closed after the disbursement of funds and resolution of all outstanding matters.
